item.title: 雷诺在日内瓦车展上发布了备受期待的新款电动车 R5，这款车型的设计灵感直接来源于雷诺 1972 年的畅销车型，这家法国汽车制造商希望它能极大地推动电动车的销售。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Renault unveiled its highly anticipated new electric R5 at the Geneva Motor Show, a model directly inspired by its 1972 bestseller that the French automaker hopes will bring a major boost to its electric vehicle sales. More here: https://t.co/s42j1Wwe2d pic.twitter.com/CHZaWu8UJW

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：日本 1 月份核心消费通胀率连续第三个月放缓，但好于预期，维持在央行 2% 的目标水平，使人们继续期待央行将在 4 月份结束负利率。
item.description:
WATCH: Japan's core consumer inflation slowed for a third straight month in January but beat forecasts and held at the central bank's 2% target, keeping alive expectations it will end negative interest rates by April https://t.co/U73xgwuMay pic.twitter.com/QfRNzlqe22

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚政府于 2023 年 3 月通过立法，强制要求员工人数超过 100 人的企业公布男女员工的薪酬，此后，澳大利亚政府首次公布了这些企业的性别薪酬差距数据。更多信息
item.description:
The Australian government released for the first time data on gender pay gaps at firms with more than 100 employees, following legislation passed in March 2023 that forced them to reveal the pay of male and female employees. More here https://t.co/V0uXUC1Cp0 pic.twitter.com/dvdUIPHHnT

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在日内瓦车展上，雷诺发布了新款电动车 R5，该车将成为最经济实惠的电动车之一，帮助这家法国公司与大量涌入并抢占市场份额的中国低价电动车竞争。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
At the Geneva Motor Show, Renault unveils its new electric R5 that is meant to be among the most affordable electric vehicles and help the French firm compete with an influx of low-priced Chinese EVs that have been grabbing market share. More here: https://t.co/s42j1Wwe2d pic.twitter.com/D47fB1x8a7

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 印度西部马哈拉施特拉邦的一位高级官员表示，该邦将检查全球快餐品牌的分店，以检查它们是否在错误宣传含有真正奶酪的产品中使用奶酪替代品，从而扩大对麦当劳的打击之外的审查范围。
item.description:
India's western state of Maharashtra will inspect outlets of global fast-food brands to check if they use cheese alternatives in products wrongly promoted as containing real cheese, widening scrutiny beyond a crackdown on McDonald's, a top official said https://t.co/XerqSUSHJr

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024
